All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.MenuElement, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class NavigatorCatalogMenu
extends javax.swing.JMenu
implements javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

Implements a standard catalog menu with separate submenus for different catalog types.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

NavigatorCatalogMenu

public NavigatorCatalogMenu(CatalogNavigatorOpener opener,
                            boolean addBrowseItem)
Create the menubar for the given main image display.
Parameters:
opener - the object responsible for creating and displaying the catalog window
navigator - used to access the catalog tree for the "Reload" item
addBrowseItem - if true, add the "Browse" menu item
Method Detail

addMenuItems

public void addMenuItems()
Add the catalog menu items.

createCatalogSubMenu

protected javax.swing.JMenu createCatalogSubMenu(javax.swing.JMenu oldMenu,
                                                 SkycatConfigFile cf,
                                                 java.lang.String servType,
                                                 java.lang.String label)
Create and return a submenu listing catalogs of the given type.
Parameters:
oldMenu - if not null, update this menu, otherwise create a new one
cf - the skycat config file reference
servType - the server type string for the catalogs that should be in the menu
label - the label for the submenu
Returns:
the ne or updated menu
